sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {saveAs} from 'file-saver' import { NavLink , useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' function Form() { const [jobId,setjobId] = useState('') const [name,setName] = useState('') const [position,setPosition] = useState('') const [email,setEmail] = useState('') const [joiningDate,setJoiningdate] = useState('') const [ctc,setCtc] = useState() const data = {jobId,name,position,email,joiningDate,ctc} const navigate = useNavigate() const submitForm = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() await axios.post(`/api/v1/offer/createpdf`, data) //create pdf next => get pdf .then((res) => axios.get(`/api/v1/offer/fetchpdf`, {responseType:'blob'})//to fetch the generate pdf .then((res)=>{ const pdfBlob = new Blob([res.data],{type:'application/pdf'}) //to save we use filesaver saveAs(pdfBlob,'OfferLetterDocument.pdf') //to clear all the inputs after downloading // setjobId('') // setName('') // setPosition('') // setEmail('') // setJoiningdate('') // setCtc(0) }) .then(()=> axios.post(`/api/v1/offer/sendpdf`, {email: email, joiningDate: joiningDate, position: position, name: name}) .then(res => { console.log(res) alert(res.data) navigate('/') }) ) ) } return (
Create Offer Letter
Job Id*
setjobId(e.target.value)} required/>
Applicant Name *
setName(e.target.value)} required/>
Email*
setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} aria-label=".form-select-sm " required/>
Job title *
A job title must describe one position
setPosition(e.target.value)} required />
{/*
*/}
Join Date*
setJoiningdate(e.target.value)} value={joiningDate} aria-label=".form-select-sm " required/>
CTC*
setCtc(e.target.value)} value={ctc} aria-label=".form-select-sm " required/>
{/*
*/} {/*
*/}
{/* */} {/* Save */} {/* Preview */} Cancel
) } export default Form
